mapper.sql: id, rule_table_id, rule_id, data_source_id, target_table_name, target_schema, source_table_name, source_schema, is_dynamic_table, dynamic_table_rule, dynamic_table_rule_value, update_time, city_code
mapper.select:
select id, target_table_name targetTableName, target_schema targetSchema, source_table_name sourceTableName, source_schema sourceSchema from t_import_rule_table
and source_schema like concat('%', ${sourceSchema}, '%')
and source_table_name like concat('%', ${sourceTableName}, '%')
and target_schema like concat('%', ${targetSchema}, '%')
and target_table_name like concat('%', ${targetTableName}, '%')
order by id asc limit ${pageNo}, ${pageSize}
select 1 from t_import_rule_table where id = #{id} limit 1 for update

select r.source_database sourceDatabase, t.rule_table_id ruleTableId, t.source_schema sourceSchema, t.source_table_name sourceTableName, t.city_code cityCode, i.tns_url tnsUrl, i.sqlldr_info_name sqlldrInfoName from t_import_rule r inner join t_import_rule_table t on t.rule_id = r.rule_id inner join t_import_sqlldr_info i on r.sqlldr_info_id = i.sqlldr_info_id where t.rule_id = #{ruleId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_import_rule_table (id, rule_table_id, rule_id, data_source_id, target_table_name, target_schema, source_table_name, source_schema, is_dynamic_table, dynamic_table_rule, dynamic_table_rule_value, update_time, city_code, target_column_list) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ruleTableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataSourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetSchema,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceSchema,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDynamicTable,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dynamicTableRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dynamicTableRuleValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{targetColumnList,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

rule_table_id = #{ruleTableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
